original_text: And the Lord will single him out from all the tribes of Israel for calamity, in accordance with all the curses of the covenant written in this Book of the Law.
korean_text: 여호와께서 곧 이스라엘 모든 지파 중에서 그를 구별하시고 이 율법책에 기록된 모든 언약의 저주대로 그에게 화를 더하시리라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord will single him out
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 그를 따로 구별하실 것이니

sentences.original_text: from all the tribes of Israel
in accordance with all the curses of the covenant
written in this Book of the Law.
